column2: b'@given2tweet Reading too much into this? Yeah, maybe. \n\nBut given that $BMY.RT closed around 50 cents, I can see it "trading" to 25 cents or so. THAT is arousing me......'
b'@given2tweet It was fortuitous that the $BMY.RT trustee got changed.'

b'@given2tweet I know you will report when you find out, but I want to keep an eye on the trading of this puppy. \n\nWhat is this I hear about having to be a holder of $BMY.RT on 12/31/20? Great way to kill any bids. Is it correct?'

b"Well played #BristolMyers.\nCompleting ~95% of the path towards #FDA approving all 3 #Celgene's drugs, yet paying nothing to old $CELG shareholders who now hold CVRs with an economic value of circa $9B, and a #market value of 0.\n$BMY $BMY.RT #Health #Healthcare $XLV https://t.co/8amxnU5T6J"
